examples: The companies are two of a kind.
Thank you, you're very kind.
My aunt is a really kind sister to my father.
Thank you for your kind words, they made my day.
The lost child was helped by a kind police officer to find their way home.
words.defineEn: a group of people or things that have similar characteristics or share particular qualities
words.defineVi: một nhóm người hoặc những thứ có đặc điểm tương tự hoặc chia sẻ phẩm chất cụ thể

examples: Art serves an important function in our society.
Art be damned!
Art is very much a matter of taste.
The born politician's art of working a crowd.
Rugby and art seem strange bedfellows.
words.defineEn: the use of creativity and imagination to express emotions and ideas by making things like paintings, sculptures, music, etc.
words.defineVi: việc sử dụng óc sáng tạo và trí tưởng tượng để thể hiện cảm xúc và ý tưởng bằng cách tạo ra những thứ như tranh vẽ, tác phẩm điêu khắc, âm nhạc, v.v.

examples: My kids personalize their notebooks with stickers and drawings.
He took along a portfolio of his drawings.
To do a drawing/painting/sketch.
She used a gray pencil to sketch out her drawing.
One mistake and we're back to the drawing board.
words.defineEn: a picture that was made using pens, pencils, or crayons instead of paint
words.defineVi: một bức tranh được làm bằng bút, bút chì hoặc bút màu thay vì sơn

examples: She makes a fortune selling handmade jewelry.
I need to find a small box for storing jewelry.
A homeless man was arrested for stealing a loaf of bread, but when a wealthy socialite was caught shoplifting expensive jewelry, she was let off with a warning.
I like the jewelry.
Around about 50% of it is in jewelry.
words.defineEn: objects such as necklaces, bracelets or rings, typically made from precious metals (gold, silver, etc.) that we wear as decoration
words.defineVi: các đồ vật như dây chuyền, vòng tay hoặc nhẫn, thường được làm từ kim loại quý (vàng, bạc, v.v.) mà chúng ta đeo để trang trí

examples: That color has gone out of fashion.
Her fashion sense is very old school, with vintage dresses and retro accessories.
This could set a new fashion.
The magazine keeps tabs on the latest fashion trends.
Italian fashion brands like Gucci and Prada are renowned for their luxury and style.
words.defineEn: the styles and trends of clothing, accessories, makeup, and other items that are popular in a certain time and place
words.defineVi: phong cách và xu hướng quần áo, phụ kiện, đồ trang điểm và các mặt hàng khác phổ biến ở một thời điểm và địa điểm nhất định

examples: Michelangelo's sculptures and paintings are a testament to the fact that genius is an infinite capacity for taking pains.
She is known for her abstract sculptures that explore the interplay of shapes, colors, and textures.
She was inspired by the paintings and sculptures created by renowned artists in the museum.
The sculpture was created in abstract form, with the artist exploring the interplay of shape and space.
Finally, she tries Layla Mabray ice sculpture, and that works.
words.defineEn: the art of shaping and engraving clay, stone, etc. to create artistic objects or figures
words.defineVi: nghệ thuật tạo hình và chạm khắc đất sét, đá, v.v. để tạo ra các đồ vật hoặc hình tượng nghệ thuật

examples: She bought a beautiful piece of European pottery as a souvenir.
Pottery became widespread.
The oldest example of spice use in cooking is 6,000-year-old pottery found with traces of garlic-mustard, a plant with otherwise little-to-no nutritional value.
This pigment was used in paint for wall art or mummy coffins, or in glazes for pottery.
Pottery Barn Kids and Teen accounted for 15% of sales, and the remainder came from lighting store Rejuvenation and online gift buying site, Mark and Graham.
words.defineEn: the skill or activity of making dishes, pots, etc. using clay
words.defineVi: kỹ năng hoặc hoạt động làm bát đĩa, nồi, v.v. bằng đất sét

examples: Even the experts took the painting for a genuine Van Gogh.
His paintings had a strong influence on me as a student.
Your painting has come out really well.
The old painting depicted a picturesque landscape from a bygone era.
The paintings were damaged beyond recall.
words.defineEn: the act or art of making pictures, using paints
words.defineVi: hành động hoặc nghệ thuật tạo ra hình ảnh, sử dụng sơn

examples: My photography is widely exposing theme of escapism.
Then, about a century or so ago, came another revolution: photography.
I've always collected black-and-white photography.
The walker has been great for photography.
Then came the invention of daguerreotype photography.
words.defineEn: the process, art, or profession of capturing photographs or recording videos
words.defineVi: quy trình, nghệ thuật hoặc nghề chụp ảnh hoặc quay video

examples: The purple flowers in the vase were beautiful.
My mom planted beautiful flowers in the front yard.
It's beautiful!
The train traveled through beautiful countryside.
The vibrant purple color of whinberries adds a beautiful touch to desserts like cheesecakes and tarts.
words.defineEn: extremely pleasing to the mind or senses
words.defineVi: cực kỳ dễ chịu cho tâm trí hoặc các giác quan

examples: Holy moly, this is exciting news!

Hockey is an exciting sport played on ice or field, with sticks and a small puck or ball.
Take the initiative and fill your life with exciting experiences.
They claim drag racing is the most exciting motor sport.
words.defineEn: making us feel interested, happy, and energetic
words.defineVi: khiến chúng ta cảm thấy thích thú, hạnh phúc và tràn đầy năng lượng

examples: The museum is a fascinating place to learn about history and art.
The monkey's intelligence and adaptability made it a fascinating creature to study.
I find it fascinating to learn about the wonders of the natural world through science.
This meeting was fascinating.
Today's question is fascinating.
words.defineEn: extremely interesting or captivating
words.defineVi: cực kỳ thú vị hoặc quyến rũ

examples: We should fill the bathtub with warm water for a relaxing bath.
My sister used to take a relaxing bath or shower before going to bed at night.
Costa Rica sounds like a great place for a relaxing vacation.
She sprinkled dried alkanet petals in her bathwater, turning it into a relaxing and visually appealing soak.
That was just so relaxing for me.
words.defineEn: helping our body or mind rest
words.defineVi: giúp cơ thể hoặc tâm trí của chúng tôi nghỉ ngơi

examples: Its depiction of a class war aboard a high tech train rocketing around a ruined earth is as thought-provoking as it is thrilling.
Each image more miraculous and thought-provoking and awe-inspiring than pretty much anything you’ll find in a museum.
words.defineEn: causing one to seriously think about a certain subject or to consider it
words.defineVi: khiến một người suy nghĩ nghiêm túc về một chủ đề nhất định hoặc xem xét nó

examples: She said an awful lot

It's awful having a boss who breathes down your neck all the time.
I told you that you'd feel awful if you drank that much wine.
He couldn't help but grimace when he saw the awful outfit his friend was wearing.
words.defineEn: extremely unpleasant, bad, or disagreeable
words.defineVi: cực kỳ khó chịu, xấu, hoặc khó chịu

examples: The movie was as boring as they come.
It’s so boring, eating the same food day in, day out.
I have to do the same boring jobs day in day out.
The child nodded off to sleep during the boring lecture.
This course seemed right up my alley when I signed up for it, but it ended up being dreadfully boring.
words.defineEn: making us feel tired and unsatisfied because of not being interesting
words.defineVi: khiến chúng ta cảm thấy mệt mỏi và không hài lòng vì không thú vị

examples: She really is weird, unsympathetic and is useless for the better part of the movie.
A: "Who's that weird guy standing in the corner?"
Audiograms are weird.
The end of the season gets weird.
This texture is weird.
words.defineEn: very strange, unusual, and not natural, in a way that is difficult to understand
words.defineVi: rất lạ, khác thường và không tự nhiên, theo cách khó hiểu

examples: You’re just silly.
Stop inventing silly excuses.
It was a classic example of the saying 'ask a silly question and get a silly answer.'
When his friends teased him about his silly hat, he laughed along and played along with the joke.
It was a classic example of the saying 'ask a silly question and get a silly answer.'
words.defineEn: feeling embarrassed or stupid
words.defineVi: cảm thấy xấu hổ hoặc ngu ngốc

examples: This is incredibly depressing.
But it becomes even more depressing.

Oh, that's a depressing distress call.
When I turned six years old, it was a very depressing time in my life.
words.defineEn: making one feel sad
words.defineVi: làm người ta buồn

examples: [Conan] Feminine products, I don't know what those are.
I've got long legs and I'm very feminine

In fact children’s clothes were designed with ease in mind, more so than displaying masculine or feminine traits.
words.defineEn: related to women; possessing qualities or appearance considered to be typical of women

examples: Some of the identities were clearly masculine.
Dragons represent yang, the masculine force.
Alphas are bold, traditionally masculine figures endowed with raw sexual confidence.
If the West is masculine than the East is feminine.
They considered the letters F, L, V, and W feminine, but the letters M, X, and Z masculine.
words.defineEn: related to men; possessing qualities or appearance considered to be typical of men
words.defineVi: liên quan đến nam giới; sở hữu phẩm chất hoặc ngoại hình được coi là điển hình của nam giới

examples: When Sarah's friends teased her about her unusual tastes in music and art, she reminded them that every Jack has his Jill, and she would eventually find someone who appreciated her interests.
The person may have unusual mannerisms.
Lamborghini situation is not unusual.
Kathy's situation is not unusual.
Was that unusual?
words.defineEn: not commonly happening or done
words.defineVi: không thường xảy ra hoặc thực hiện

examples: Equip yourself with five practical strategies that help you win the uphill battle and take your project professional career to new heights.
Her husband is a man of ideas while she is a practical doctor, a woman of action.
You need to have a practical plan in place to ensure your success.
That experience made me open my eyes and started my search for a martial art that teaches practical self-defence skills.
Mark was thinking about buying a new car, but he wanted to get a second opinion, so he took his dad's advice and went for a more practical model.
words.defineEn: of, based on, or relating to practice or action rather than theory or hypothesis
words.defineVi: của, dựa trên, hoặc liên quan đến thực tiễn hoặc hành động hơn là lý thuyết hoặc giả thuyết

examples: You raise some interesting points.

It's an interesting proposal.
All of them had an interesting story to tell.
The game's premise and mechanics are interesting, but there's just no meat on the bone when it comes to story and gameplay variety.
words.defineEn: catching and keeping our attention because of being unusual, exciting, etc.
words.defineVi: thu hút và giữ sự chú ý của chúng tôi vì khác thường, thú vị, v.v.
